alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:43PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Elko and north central Eureka Counties through 515 PM PDT... At 443 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Carlin, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
